thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 4 of 447
thread.title: William Poore

author: William Poore
title: William Poore
text: Want to thank Ashley Reetz and the manager for a truly nice car buying experience. I was told by every dealership that I went to that they could not help me in purchasing a vehicle. Ashley was nice, listened and was willing to help. I was able to get a great Chevy traverse. Finally have something to drive that I can be proud of. Thanks Ashley and drive time. Would recommend them to anyone.
